name: You Are Not A Clone
description:
A game about cloning yourself and a block to solve puzzles. In this game, you will have at least one companion at all times. 

You are not alone...

You are not a clone

Instructions:

wasd to move

r or delete to restart

[BUG ALERT] don't press esc or the game will crash (this would normally close the game if it was not running in a browser)

Credits:

Programmers - Noah Young and Cameron

Art - Andrew Giacalone and Noah Young

Music, Sound Design and Implementation - Skylar Hale

Level Design - Skylar Hale
